price: Son grados que Él concede, junto con Su perdón y misericordia. Dios es Indulgente y Misericordioso.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
